experiencia.descripcion: Training in Microcomputer Systems and Networks at IES Sant Vicent Ferrer in Algemesí. Acquired competencies in operating system administration, local area networks, hardware, and technical support, establishing a solid foundation in IT infrastructure.

Hands-on experience in repair and maintenance of IT equipment (computers, printers, and peripherals). Responsible for network configuration and troubleshooting in enterprise environments, providing first-line technical support and ensuring the operability of technological infrastructure.

Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development at IES Sant Vicent Ferrer in Algemesí. Specialization in object-oriented programming, web and mobile development, databases, and agile methodologies. Development of projects integrating multiple technologies and platforms.

Active participation in the development of ImaCash, an enterprise cash management application. Implementation of features using C# with .NET Framework 4, database design and optimization with SQL Server. Team collaboration through version control with Git and Gitea, applying development best practices and collaborative methodologies.
